item.title: Free Kali Linux book – Kali Linux Revealed
item.dc:creator: Daniel
item.description: I came across this a few months ago, it’s not a book on hacking or even how to prep for the PWK / OSCP. item.content:encoded:
I came across this a few months ago, it’s not a book on hacking or even how to prep for the PWK / OSCP. But, it’s free, and available from the Kali Linux team themselves, so there is no more accurate place to get information on the distro than them. Note: There is a certification that they offer that this material is targeted for, I don’t know of the market value / ROI of that cert, but the course and book are free and no reason not to check it out. 

https://www.kali.org/download-kali-linux-revealed-book/
